label.handle: The text "%{handle}" will be encrypted if you decide to vote for this option.

authenticate.default_header: Sign in with your credentials to vote

not_assigned_any_ballot.body: You have not been assigned to any ballots. If you believe this to be a mistake, please contact your electoral responsible.

challenge.encryption_key_purpose: This encryption key, together with the 'Randomness' of each ballot, was used to generate each envelope. Use the 'Ballot Opener' app to verify that the content of each envelope corresponds to your vote.
challenge.your_encryption_key: The encryption key used to encrypt your votes was:

election_status.is_running_from_to_html: The election is running from %{from} to %{to}
election_status.not_yet_open: The election is not yet open
election_status.was_running_from_to_html: The election was running from %{from} to %{to}

error.challenge_proof_invalid:
A technical error happened (proof of empty cryptograms did not validate).
Reload the page and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
error.unknown_error:
A technical error happened.
Reload the page and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
error.vote_overwriting_disabled: You have already cast your vote.
error.voter_disabled:
Your access has been revoked.
Please contact support to resolve the issue.
error.voter_not_found:
Election code is invalid.
Please verify that the election code is correct before you try again.

section1.text: Information regarding documentation, privacy policy and system provider.

section2.text: Information regarding the election process can be found on the bulletin board of the election.

section3.label: Show cryptograms for validation of cast vote.

general.vote_overwriting_warning: You have already cast your vote. Be advised that only your last cast vote will be applicable.

network_error.body_html:
Could not connect to server.

Please ensure that you are connected to the internet and try again.
network_error.title: Connection error

receipt.acknowledgement_body: The server acknowledged your submission, registered it and sent back a server signature as a proof of registration.
receipt.body_html: Your vote has been registered. Thank you for your participation.
receipt.redirected_in_seconds: You will be redirected in %{countdown} seconds
receipt.signing_body: These were signed with your public signing key and sent to the server:

technical.authenticate_html: You have activated voter verification. In order to verify your vote, you need to download Assembly Voting “Ballot Opener” on your smartphone from App Store or Google Play.
technical.ballot_html: The colored texts below the available options represents the value that will be encrypted if you decide to vote for this option.
technical.challenge_html:
Use the Ballot Opener app to scan the QR-code of each envelope. You can also insert the cryptographic values in the application to reveal the content of your ballot.

If the content of the envelope is identical with the vote you casted for, it means the system correctly encrypted your vote. Otherwise, it is an evidence that the system has been corrupted. In such case, please contact support.

Please note: These votes will NOT be included in the result. You have to vote again!
technical.cryptograms_html:
This is your encrypted ballots.

If you want to verify the content that was encrypted by the system, you can click on “Open envelopes”. This verification ensures that the system is encrypting the casted votes as intended by the voter. After opening an envelope for verification of its content, you will need to recast your vote.
technical.receipt_html:
This is your voting receipt.

You can download it and save it for verification purposes. You can, at any time, check your vote by accessing the bulletin board of the election, where all activities are registered during the election. By uploading the voting receipt, you can verify that you vote has been registered and included in the final result.
technical.receipt_no_board_html:
This is your voting receipt.

You can download it and save it for verification purposes.
technical.summary_html: The colored text below the selected option represents the value that will be encrypted. It is also the value that you should see, if you decide to open your ballot for verification of its content.

single_vote.blank_is_exclusive: Blank is exclusive and cannot be combined with other options.
single_vote.write_in_required: You are required to specify at least a party when 'Write in' is selected.
single_vote.write_in_too_long: The write in value is too long. Try to reduce its length.
